parameters.name: NAME
parameters.description: The name assigned to all of the objects defined in this template.  You should keep this as default unless your know what your doing.

parameters.name: APP_GROUP
parameters.description: The name assigned to all of the deployments in this project.

parameters.name: SOURCE_IMAGE_KIND
parameters.description: The 'kind' (type) of the  source image; typically ImageStreamTag, or DockerImage.

parameters.name: SOURCE_IMAGE_NAME
parameters.description: The name of the source image.

parameters.name: SOURCE_IMAGE_TAG
parameters.description: The tag of the source image.

parameters.name: STRATEGY_IMAGE_KIND
parameters.description: The 'kind' (type) of the strategy image; typically ImageStreamTag, or DockerImage.

parameters.name: STRATEGY_IMAGE_NAME
parameters.description: The name of the strategy image.

parameters.name: STRATEGY_IMAGE_NAME_SPACE
parameters.description: The name space of the strategy image.

parameters.name: STRATEGY_IMAGE_TAG
parameters.description: The tag of the strategy image.

parameters.name: SOURCE_IMAGE_TAG
parameters.description: The tag of the source image.

parameters.name: OUTPUT_IMAGE_KIND
parameters.description: The 'kind' (type) of the output image; typically ImageStreamTag, or DockerImage.

parameters.name: OUTPUT_IMAGE_TAG
parameters.description: The tag given to the built image.

parameters.name: CPU_REQUEST
parameters.description: The resources CPU request (in cores) for this build.

parameters.name: CPU_LIMIT
parameters.description: The resources CPU limit (in cores) for this build.

parameters.name: MEMORY_REQUEST
parameters.description: The resources Memory request (in Mi, Gi, etc) for this build.

parameters.name: MEMORY_LIMIT
parameters.description: The resources Memory limit (in Mi, Gi, etc) for this build.

parameters.name: WEB_APP_CONTEXT_PATH
parameters.description: The path at which web application is deployed.Context root for the web applicaton
